# ShieldGram

## Project Summary
ShieldGram is an AI-powered SaaS platform designed to moderate Instagram comments. It automatically detects and hides spam, hate speech, harassment, and toxic content to protect brands and influencers.

## Core Features
- **AI Analysis**: Uses AI models to understand context, sarcasm, and nuance.
- **Real-time Protection**: Scans comments in intervals as short as 30 seconds.
- **Custom Policies**: Users can toggle specific protections (Spam, Hate Speech, Violence, Sexual Content) as well as completely custom policies
- **Dashboard**: A comprehensive view of scanned comments, blocked threats, and analytics.
- **Privacy First**: User data is not stored; analysis is ephemeral.

## Pricing
- **Standard ($5/mo)**: 10k comments/mo, 1 account, 5 min scan interval.
- **Plus ($10/mo)**: 25k comments/mo, 5 accounts, 2 min scan interval.
- **Premium ($25/mo)**: 100k comments/mo, 10 accounts, <1 min scan interval, custom policies.
- **Max ($100/mo)**: Unlimited comments, unlimited accounts, custom policies.
